meanings.sent1: She is marriageable and ready to start a family.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, people become marriageable at a young age.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the marriageable dog next door was quite charming.
meanings.sent4: The old house was marriageable again after a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent5: The job offer made him feel more marriageable and stable in life.

meanings.sent1: The ring symbolized her marriageable status.
meanings.sent2: The prince was marriageable to any princess in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The marriageable cake was eagerly waiting to be paired with frosting.
meanings.sent4: The empty house looked marriageable, waiting for a new family to move in.
meanings.sent5: The car, with its shiny exterior, seemed marriageable to any buyer.
